about_the_game:
Welcome to a unique and captivating word game that’s perfect for fans of crosswords and other word puzzles. In this game, your task is to pick letters from the bottom frame and place them in the correct spots to complete words. You have the freedom to choose any empty space to fill, allowing for a relaxed and flexible gameplay experience.

Set against a vibrant spring theme, the game brings the season to life with beautiful gardens, blooming flowers, and the spirit of new beginnings. Designed to be simple and accessible, it’s an easy-to-learn game that the whole family can enjoy together.

To add an exciting challenge, the game features special letter blocks:

  • Mystery Block: Click to reveal the hidden letter inside.

  • Locked Letter: This letter is locked and unusable until you complete a word beside it to unlock it.

The game can be played seamlessly with a keyboard and mouse, offering smooth and intuitive controls. Each level is accompanied by stunning backgrounds and delightful music, creating an immersive and enjoyable atmosphere.

This demo version lets you try the game for free, giving you a taste of its charm and challenge. Dive in, solve puzzles, and explore a world of springtime joy!
